title: Zero Reflex
description:
About This Game
Do you have what it takes to win $10.000?
Circles, bullets, shurikens, rockets, saws and time ... they're all after you! Zero Reflex is a psychedelic evader which tests both your dexterity and your nerves in a fast-paced punishing environment that keeps pushing your limits. Zero Reflex puts 60 challenges in front of you. You have no save points and no excuses! Be faster than a blink of the Eye!
Features

    Minimalistic, clean design
    Action packed psychedelic levels
    The further you go the harder you are punished for your mistakes
    3 game modes: Normal, Hard and Nightmare
    60 challenges 

History
Zero Reflex is a little game project with minimalistic and clear design but with very addictive and frustrating gameplay. Do you have what it takes? Fun Fact: the initial code name of the project was The Reflexx 2. Due to similarities with many other published games the team decided to go with the name "Eye Will Survive!" which is a pun title inspired by the song "I will survive" by Gloria Gaynor, which after the soft launch was again renamed into Zero Reflex
